director.name: 吉多·范德韦弗 Guido van der Werve

this_title: Nummer acht, everything is going to be alright
introduction: In the Finnish Gulf of Bothnia, the artist is filmed while walking on an ice field in front of an enormous icebreaker. There is no music, only the dull thuds of the ship as it travels along its trajectory. In the wide shot, van der Werve seems fragile and tiny, about to be swallowed by the immense ship behind him.源自：https://www.schermodellarte.org/en/film/nummer-acht-everything-is-going-to-be-alright/
chinese_title: Nummer acht, everything is going to be alright
